attributes.action: give occupiers of second homes the same rights as those who have static or mobile caravans in addition to their main home by allowing one TV licence to cover both homes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If you have a licence for your main home and you have a TV set in a static or mobile caravan, you can make a declaration that you only watch TV at one location at a time and then only pay one licence fee.

If you have two homes, but only watch TV at one location at a time, you need two licenses
